entry.title: WIND WARNING ENDED, Bridgetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 2:09 PM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Rain, 12.4°C

entry.title: Thursday: Rain at times heavy. High 12.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 mm. Wind southeast 60 km/h gusting to 90 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 this afternoon. High 12. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Rain showers ending overnight then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Rainfall amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 8 overnight. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Mainly cloudy. Temperature steady near minus 2.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light in the afternoon. Temperature steady near minus 2. Wind chill near minus 8. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM AST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 11 except minus 16 in low lying areas.
